name: My 2017 MacBook Pro is having constant issues with USB peripherals randomly disconnect. Given that I haven't unplugged the laptop from its monitors in months, I am considering moving to a desktop, but timing isn't great right now.

content.html: My 2017 MacBook Pro is having constant issues with USB peripherals randomly disconnect. Given that I haven't unplugged the laptop from its monitors in months, I am considering moving to a desktop, but timing isn't great right now.
content.value: My 2017 MacBook Pro is having constant issues with USB peripherals randomly disconnect. Given that I haven't unplugged the laptop from its monitors in months, I am considering moving to a desktop, but timing isn't great right now.

summary: building a (totally silent) 32 core threadripper with 128GB of RAM early in lockdown was one of the better decisions I've made this year.

content.html: building a (totally silent) 32 core threadripper with 128GB of RAM early in lockdown was one of the better decisions I've made this year.
content.value: building a (totally silent) 32 core threadripper with 128GB of RAM early in lockdown was one of the better decisions I've made this year.

summary: So badass. I will get a new computer in 2021, I think... just need this one to limp along a *little* longer.
